name: Checkup and Visit
description: Regular dental visits are important because they help to keep your teeth and gums healthy. During the dental check up, your dental professional will check your overall oral health for any trouble areas

name: Braces
description: Through braces treatment, problems like crooked or crowded teeth can be corrected. Braces treatment can also treat other problems like overbite or underbite and jaw joint problems.

name: Crowns and Bridges
description: A crown or cap is a dental restoration that covers the exposed surface of a tooth to strengthen it or improve its appearance. A bridge is a dental restoration to replace one or more missing teeth.

name: Teeth Whitening
description: A product is considered simply "whitening" when it removes food or debris from the teeth without bleach. Bleaching products contain peroxide and these products remove both surface and deep stains on teeth and can cause teeth to become even lighter than their natural shade.

name: Wisdom Tooth Removal
description: To remove the wisdom tooth, your dentist will open up the gum tissue over the tooth and take out any bone that is covering the tooth. He or she will separate the tissue connecting the tooth to the bone and then remove the tooth.

name: Dental Emergency
description: In general, any dental problem that needs immediate treatment to stop bleeding, alleviate severe pain, or save a tooth is considered an emergency. This consideration also applies to severe infections that can be life-threatening.

name: Emergency Surgery
description: If you have severe pain, bleeding, swelling or other signs of infection, broken teeth or trouble moving your jaw, don't wait to get help. Contact your dentist immediately, or if the office is closed, head straight to the emergency room
